title: How Much Should You Know About SEO? Just Enough to Ask the Right Questions (and Ignore the Hype)
excerpt: A practical guide for business owners who need to understand SEO well enough to make smart decisions without getting lost in technical details or falling for SEO snake oil.
author: Joe Perez

seo.metaDescription: Learn exactly how much SEO knowledge business owners need to make smart decisions and avoid common pitfalls. Practical SEO guidance without the hype.
